record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - April 02, 2008)

[Page: H1904]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on H.R. 5501.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
